name: A Paddling Of Ducks
description:
Welcome to A Paddling Of Ducks, a tiny game about guiding your brood of ducklings upriver to their new home.  Your ducklings will follow their mother as best they can, but the river is covered with dangerous logs and rocks, and its a long way up.

Use arrow keys to move your character. More ducklings to deal with will be added as the speed and difficulty increases. Try to stay *ahem* joined together as you see how few ducklings you can lose on your way up.  

Made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2021.
